text.section: The Fund, the Rate Stabilization Account, and the Medical Assistance Program Account shall be used only for the purposes stated in this subtitle.

On or before March 15 of each year, the Secretary of Health and Mental Hygiene shall report to the Legislative Policy Committee, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, on:
the amount of money disbursed to the Maryland Medical Assistance Program under § 19-807 of this subtitle;
the amount of increase in fee-for-service health care provider rates; and
the amount of increase in capitation payments to managed care organizations.
